mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_HRSYS_INTERVIEW (JIV_RESUME_ID, JIV_RECRUIT_ID, JIV_DATE, JIV_LOCATION, JIV_STATUS) VALUES (#{resume.resuID},#{recruit.riid},#{jivDate},#{jivLocal},#{jivStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT iv.*, rs.RESU_ID, rs.RESU_NAME, re.RI_ID, re.RI_NAME, re.RI_COMPANY, re.RI_SALARY FROM T_HRSYS_INTERVIEW iv JOIN T_HRSYS_RESUME rs ON iv.JIV_RESUME_ID=rs.RESU_ID JOIN T_HRSYS_RECRUITINF re ON iv.JIV_RECRUIT_ID=re.RI_ID WHERE iv.JIV_RESUME_ID=#{arg0} AND iv.JIV_RECRUIT_ID=#{arg1}

SELECT iv.*, rs.RESU_ID, rs.RESU_NAME, re.RI_ID, re.RI_NAME, re.RI_COMPANY, re.RI_SALARY FROM T_HRSYS_INTERVIEW iv JOIN T_HRSYS_RESUME rs ON iv.JIV_RESUME_ID=rs.RESU_ID JOIN T_HRSYS_RECRUITINF re ON iv.JIV_RECRUIT_ID=re.RI_ID WHERE iv.JIV_RESUME_ID=#{arg0}

SELECT iv.*, rs.RESU_ID, rs.RESU_NAME, re.* FROM T_HRSYS_INTERVIEW iv JOIN T_HRSYS_RESUME rs ON iv.JIV_RESUME_ID=rs.RESU_ID JOIN T_HRSYS_RECRUITINF re ON iv.JIV_RECRUIT_ID=re.RI_ID WHERE iv.JIV_ID=#{jivID}
